tool_description: Provides data for all Nobel award winners throughout history
name: Nobel award winners
title: Nobel award winners

api_list.name: AllPeaceAwardWinners
api_list.description: Get data from all Nobel peace award winners throughout history
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nobel-award-winners.p.rapidapi.com/peaceAwardWinners"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nobel-award-winners.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://nobel-award-winners.p.rapidapi.com/peaceAwardWinners"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nobel-award-winners.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
